b:widget.title: Particles effect, Sticky menu and more.

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Display Particles effect on Header (true or false)
Top Menu Is Always Visible (true or false)
Force Uppercase In Titles (true or false)

b:if.cond: data:link.name == "Display Particles effect on Header (true or false)"
data:link.name == "Top Menu Is Always Visible (true or false)" and data:link.target == "true"
data:link.name == "Force Uppercase In Titles (true or false)" and data:link.target == "true"

b:include.data: { image: data:image, altText: data:blog.title.escaped, originalWidth: data:width, originalHeight: data:height}
b:include.name: responsiveImage

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting:
Health

    Languages

    Tech

    Travel

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=550, height=650, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=550, height=450, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=735, height=750, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
